definition: China Travel Service (CTS), state-owned travel company

sentences.english: At that time many restaurants were called as eateries, and hotels as hostels.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，很多饭店都叫饮食店，宾馆叫旅社。

sentences.english: Good afternoon, sir. Welcome to FOSHBN Electrcical Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 中午好，先生，欢迎惠临佛山电子旅社。

sentences.english: Only a few posting-chaises were setting out at a gallop from the Hotel des Princes and the Hotel Meurice.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数几辆邮车从亲王旅社和默里斯旅社奔驰出发。

sentences.english: Only a few posting-chaises were setting out at a gallop from the Hotel des Princes and the Hotel Meurice.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数几辆邮车从亲王旅社和默里斯旅社奔驰出发。

sentences.english: The Dog Bark Park Inn is owned by two artists.
sentences.chinese: 犬吠公园小旅社的主人是两位艺术家。

sentences.english: When I backpacked around Europe, I stayed in hostels to keep my expenses down.
sentences.chinese: 我轻装环游欧洲时，住在旅社里降低旅行费用。

sentences.english: You can even find a hostel to stay in if you are travelling in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在欧洲的话还可以找一家青年旅社呆着。

sentences.english: There's a job at the New Asia Hotel.
By the time I got to the Youth Hostel it was midnight. I was exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 回到青年旅社的时候已经是午夜了，我精疲力尽了。

sentences.english: Luckily, one of the hostel’s guests understood.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，青年旅社的一个住客明白。

sentences.english: We can book a youth hotel.
He had checked into the dilapidated Bayamo Hotel on schedule.
sentences.chinese: 他按时住进了破旧的贝阿莫旅社。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, it's the policy of our hotel. I hope you will understand.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，这是我们旅社的规定，我希望您能理解。

sentences.english: Kathy and Evan check into the Copenhagen Hostel.
sentences.chinese: 艾凡在哥本哈根的青年旅社登记住房。

sentences.english: Stop living like you’re in a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 不要再像你在旅社一样的生活。

sentences.english: BNo, sir. We left directly from the hostel.
sentences.chinese: 没有，先生，我们直接从旅社出发的。

definition: youth hostel/abbr. for 青年旅舍[qing1 nian2 lu:3 she4]
abbr. for 標準間|标准间[biao1 zhun3 jian1], standard (hotel) room
hotel room with one double (or queen or king) bed
standard (hotel) room/two-person room of standard size and amenities/abbr. to 标间
